p: One prompt is all it takes to turn browsers into buyers!
STYLE IS HOW YOU SELL IT
Feels like magic. Powered by AI.
Always on. Always learning. Always styling to sell.
Genie grants styling wishes faster than any team ever could — transforming static catalogs into full outfits tailored to each shopper.
Our AI stylist — the smartest hire you’ll ever make.
Let shoppers search by style, vibe, or photo.
Whether they type, talk, or upload a picture — your customers tell Genie what they want, and we take it from there.
See your catalog turn into complete outfits, tailored to each shopper’s body type, vibe, and budget — no extra work needed.
Talk to the Genie to tweak the look.
Your customers can swap, remove, or add items to perfect the look — driving more engagement and increasing average cart size.
Let them see before they buy.
Outfits rendered on real bodies. Confidence goes up.
Agent of agents, the Genie grants styling wishes faster than any team ever could — transforming static catalogs into full outfits tailored to each shopper.
Track engagement, conversions, and styling performance — and optimize in real time.
Tailor every interaction based on your customer’s body type, style, and behavior — no manual tagging needed.
Customers try on before they buy and see complete outfits that fit — increasing purchase confidence and reducing returns
Make your store feel curated for each visitor. More time spent, more cart adds, more purchases.
Seamlessly integrate with your existing e-commerce stack.
Designed to deliver value across your entire organisation!
Discover what customers want styled — not just what sells.
Turn static catalogs into dynamic outfit journeys that convert and monitor performance with real-time dashboards.
Run smarter campaigns with look-based targeting and try-on insights.
Launch AI styling instantly — no in-house dev needed.
The way we shop for fashion is broken.
Less than 10% of retailers use AI to personalise the experience, resulting in generic suggestions, high return rates, and wasted stock.
It's frustrating for customers. Expensive for brands. And unsustainable for the planet.
We believe fashion deserves better — for shoppers, brands, and the planet.
Our Vision for the Future of Style
We envision a world where fashion is personal, intelligent, and sustainable. Where every outfit is curated to fit your vibe, body, and budget — powered by AI..
A world where data helps reduce waste, not create it.
StyleGenie transforms how people shop and how brands connect.
By improving search systems and reducing returns, we help brands lower unsold stock and waste, powering a more sustainable fashion economy!
Because responsible fashion isn’t a trend — It’s the future.
Join our waiting list or talk to our team if you have any questions!
